## SyncVarManager class

SyncVar管理器 负责管理所有带有SyncVar的实例，追踪变化并生成同步批次

**Signature:**

```text
export declare class SyncVarManager extends EventEmitter 
```
**Extends:** [EventEmitter](./ecs-framework-monorepo.eventemitter.md)
